From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=こうき}} compound {{m|ltc|高貴||tr=*kaw *kjwɨjH}}. Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} {{m|zh|高貴|tr=gāoguì}}.

{{ja-pron|yomi=on|こうき|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Adjective===
